title: LightSite AI Research Shows: Global Brands Are Being Outplayed In AI Search By Smaller, Focused Competitors
description: New LightSite AI and theCUBE Research brief warns slow moving brands risk losing visibility in LLM search while smaller competitors gain ground through authentic content and more effective use of structured data.LightSite AI and theCUBE Research announced a new research

title: AI deepfakes of real doctors spreading health misinformation on social media
description: Hundreds of videos on TikTok and elsewhere impersonate experts to sell supplements with unproven effects

title: AI deepfakes of real doctors spreading health misinformation on social media
description: Hundreds of videos on TikTok and elsewhere impersonate experts to sell supplements with unproven effectsTikTok and other social media platforms are hosting AI-generated deepfake videos of doctors whose words have been manipulated to help sell supplements and spread health misinformation.The factchecking organisation Full Fact has uncovered hundreds of such videos featuring impersonated versions of doctors and influencers directing viewers to Wellness Nest, a US-based supplements firm. Continue reading...

title: A newly revealed Steam game just got canceled because of its AI usage
description: A new Postal game was canceled right after its reveal because of its apparent use of AI-generated content
